resources.string: An I/O exception occurred. Please try again.
Downloading instructions...\n(this can take a while, sorry!)

Do you have what it takes to become a Master Builder? View dozens of instruction sets for LEGO models and follow along! The instructions are sourced from the www.cubiculus.com database and will refresh once every three days.\n\nMake sure to sign in to Google+ to track achievements!
You are on your way to becoming a Master Builder!
You are on your way to becoming a Master Builder!\n\nSign in to Google+ from the main list to unlock achievements!
Sign in to Google+ to access achievements!
Lego designed by jon trillana from The Noun Project
There was a problem contacting the Cubiculus database. Please check your network connection and try again.
Failed to sign in. Please check your network connection and try again.

The application is incorrectly configured. Check that the package name and signing certificate match the client ID created in Developer Console. Also, if the application is not yet published, check that the account you are trying to sign in with is listed as a tester account. See logs for more information.
I have my own API key!
